title: Can anyone tell me what font this is
content:
Can anyone tell me what the fonts are on the subheadings on this cover please or anything similair?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220018im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6_5416.jpg)

 [‹ Can you name this font, please?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220018/http:/typophile.com/node/38987 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Pantone logo - Akzidenz-Grotesk {Marten F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220018/http:/typophile.com/node/38772 "Go to next forum topic")
author: missmba
